detail_desc: Cotton jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at cuffs and hem. One top with an all-over print.
Shorts in a cotton and linen weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Two-button jacket in a textured cotton weave with a chest pocket and flap welt pockets at the front. Contrasting colour elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short, halterneck top in jersey crêpe with wide flounces at the sides and back.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey that can be worn off the shoulder with decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Calf-length pleated skirt in tulle with an elasticated waist and short underskirt.
Toe-post sandals with a decorative knot at the front and an adjustable heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Jumper with a round neck and long sleeves. Wide trousers with an elasticated waist and decorative grosgrain bow.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Short, crocheted dress in a soft cotton blend with a stand-up collar and double flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders. Cut-out back section with a button at the back of the neck and buttons at the back. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x170 cm.
Fine-knit jacket in a soft viscose blend with a drawstring hood, zip and front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly shorter, boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, chest pocket, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Short, straight-cut coat in sturdy fabric with patch front pockets and no buttons. Lined.
Dungaree shorts in organic cotton seersucker with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, a button at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a slightly wider neckline, press-studs at the top and fake flap pockets with decorative buttons.
Short jumper in a soft cable knit with a slightly wider neckline and dropped shoulders.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Soft, non-wired lace bralettes with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumpsuit in soft, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and, ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized, block-coloured jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace sections, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cropped vest top in ribbed cotton jersey.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Football-shaped plastic whistle and fabric cord with an easily loosened plastic fastener. Size of whistle 3x5 cm. Size of cards 7x11 cm.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying, thermal fleece with a drawstring hood and zip down the front. Mesh-lined side pockets with a zip, and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Elasticated waist with a twisted drawstring and one back pocket.
Wide hooded top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidered appliqués and a drawstring at the top. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a double frill trim in woven fabric and elastication at the top.
Wide metal stick barrette.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Narrow metal rings in various designs, two decorated with faceted sparkly stones.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in imitation leather. High, elasticated, frill-trimmed paper bag waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.

Trousers in a sturdy weave with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a detachable tie belt with metal D-rings. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and straight legs.

Light-support sports bralette suitable for low-intensity workouts with a fast-drying function designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Wide shoulder straps, a racer back and lined cups with removable inserts for an adjustable fit and to shape the bust. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Trousers in an extra-soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a wide jersey panel and elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a flounce at the hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked turtle neck and smocked yoke. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Shorts in a cotton weave. High, elasticated waist with ties, and frill-trimmed hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Vest top in sturdy, ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with a racer back, lacing at the sides and raw edges. Gently rounded hem.
Dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Short cap sleeves, a tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-shaped opening and buttons at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Striped jumper in fine-knit cotton with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with short slits in the sides.
Wide pull-on trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave. Regular waist with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt at the front and elastication at the back, and side pockets.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a button placket and a lace yoke at the front. Long sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist. Fake fly with a decorative button, and front and back pockets.
Straight-cut shirt in Tencel® lyocell denim with a collar, classic front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Fine-knit over-the-knee socks.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline and long sleeves.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Semi-circular clutch bag in paper straw with embroidery and a zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x15x27 cm.
A-line chiffon dress in a narrow cut at the top. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and tiered flock-print flounces. Lined.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round, gathered neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves, smocking a the waist and a softly draping, gathered skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with an intarsia motif on the front and an appliqué on one sleeve. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to shorts. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, patch back pockets and legs that can be folded up with a tab and button.
